document.full_text: a major aftershock rocked northeast japan on thursday and a tsunami warning was issued for the coast devastated by last month's massive quake and tsunami that crippled a nuclear power plant.
document.title: aftershock shakes japan's ruined northeast coast
lines_and_colors: a major aftershock rocked northeast japan on thursday and a tsunami warning was issued for the coast devastated by last month's massive quake and tsunami that crippled a nuclear power plant.
